entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then a few showers. Wind becoming south 30 km/h in the morning. High 7. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:26 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 7.
